speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: Brothers and sisters, President Nelson has asked that I handle the business of the solemn assembly for which we are gathered today.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: This is an occasion of great significance for members of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints throughout the world.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: Dating from October 10, 1880, when John Taylor was sustained to succeed Brigham Young as prophet, seer, and revelator and President of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, each of these occasions has been designated as a formal solemn assembly of the body of the Church to express the voice of the Church.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: We will vote by quorums and groups. Wherever you are, you are invited to stand only when requested and express by your uplifted hand that you choose to sustain those whose names will be presented. You should vote only when asked to stand.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: The General Authorities assigned to the Tabernacle and the Assembly Hall on Temple Square will observe the voting in those facilities. In stake centers, a member of the stake presidency will observe the voting. If anyone casts a contrary vote, those individuals should contact their respective stake presidents.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: We will now proceed. Again, please stand and vote only when asked to do so.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: We ask members of the First Presidency to please arise.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: It is proposed that the First Presidency sustain Russell Marion Nelson as prophet, seer, and revelator and President of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: Those of the First Presidency in favor, please manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: It is proposed that the First Presidency sustain Dallin Harris Oaks as First Counselor and Henry Bennion Eyring as Second Counselor in the First Presidency of the Church.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: Those members of the First Presidency in favor may manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: It is proposed that the First Presidency sustain Dallin Harris Oaks as President of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles and Melvin Russell Ballard as Acting President of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: Members of the First Presidency in favor may manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: It is proposed that the First Presidency sustain as members of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles: M. Russell Ballard, Jeffrey R. Holland, Dieter F. Uchtdorf, David A. Bednar, Quentin L. Cook, D. Todd Christofferson, Neil L. Andersen, Ronald A. Rasband, Gary E. Stevenson, Dale G. Renlund, Gerrit Walter Gong, and Ulisses Soares.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: Members of the First Presidency, please manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: It is proposed that the First Presidency sustain the counselors in the First Presidency and the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles as prophets, seers, and revelators.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: Members of the First Presidency will please manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: The First Presidency will now be seated.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: We invite Elder Gong and Elder Soares to take their places with the Quorum of the Twelve.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: The members of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles only, including Elder Gong and Elder Soares, will please arise.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: It is proposed that the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles sustain Russell Marion Nelson as prophet, seer, and revelator and President of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, together with his counselors and members of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles as they have been presented and voted upon by the First Presidency.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: Members of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles in favor, please manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: You may be seated.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: We ask the General Authority Seventies and members of the Presiding Bishopric to please arise.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: It is proposed that all General Authority Seventies and members of the Presiding Bishopric sustain Russell Marion Nelson as prophet, seer, and revelator and President of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, together with his counselors and members of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles as they have been presented and voted upon by the First Presidency.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: All General Authority Seventies and members of the Presiding Bishopric who are in favor, please manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: You may be seated.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: We ask the following to please arise wherever you may be throughout the world: all Area Seventies, ordained patriarchs, high priests, and elders.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: It is proposed that Russell Marion Nelson be sustained as prophet, seer, and revelator and President of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, together with his counselors and members of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles as they have been presented and voted upon.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: All in favor, please manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: Any opposed may so manifest it.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: Please be seated.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: Will all members of the Relief Society—that is, all women 18 years of age and older—please arise.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: It is proposed that Russell Marion Nelson be sustained as prophet, seer, and revelator and President of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, together with his counselors and members of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles as previously presented and voted upon.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: All in favor, please indicate by the uplifted hand.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: Any opposed may so indicate.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: You may be seated.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: Will all those holding only the Aaronic Priesthood—that is, all ordained priests, teachers, and deacons—please arise.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: It is proposed that Russell Marion Nelson be sustained as prophet, seer, and revelator and President of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, together with his counselors and members of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles as previously presented and voted upon.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: All in favor, please indicate by the uplifted hand.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: Any opposed may so indicate.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: You may be seated.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: Will the young women who are ages 12 to 18 please arise.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: It is proposed that Russell Marion Nelson be sustained as prophet, seer, and revelator and President of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, together with his counselors and members of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles as previously presented and voted upon.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: All in favor, please indicate by the uplifted hand.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: Any opposed may so indicate.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: You may be seated.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: We now ask that the entire membership, wherever you are located, including all of those who have previously stood, please arise.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: It is proposed that Russell Marion Nelson be sustained as prophet, seer, and revelator and President of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, together with his counselors and members of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles as they have been presented and voted upon.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: All in favor, please indicate by the uplifted hand.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: Any opposed may so indicate.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: You may all be seated.

speaker: Presented by President Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency
title: Solemn Assembly
paragraph_text: Thank you, brothers and sisters, for your love and support.
